knimeNode.name: Number To Category (Apply)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reverts the actions of Category To Number (Apply) by mapping the numbers back to categories.

intro.p: This node takes columns with integer data and maps every number to the former category string. The information for the value mapping is taken from the PMML model.
This node is typically used to apply the same mapping found by a Category To Number node.

fullDescription.option: If checked, the computed columns will be appended to the input table. Otherwise the computed columns replace their source columns.
The column name of the computed columns are the name of the column in the input appended by this suffix.

ports.outPort: Pass-through of the incoming PMML document
